original_text: Then he made the sea of cast metal. It was round, ten cubits from brim to brim, and five cubits high, and a line of thirty cubits measured its circumference.
korean_text: 또 바다를 부어 만들었으니 그 직경이 십 규빗이요 그 모양이 둥글며 그 높이는 다섯 규빗이요 주위는 삼십 규빗 줄을 두를 만하며

sentences.original_text: Then he made the sea of cast metal.
ten cubits from brim to brim
and a line of thirty cubits measured its circumference.
sentences.korean_translation: 삼십 규빗 되는 줄이 그 둘레를 재었습니다.
